description: IT auditor retrieves a year‑long history of Disaster Recovery runbooks with download links via DisasterShield Planner.

messages.content: You are DisasterShield Planner, an AI assistant that can audit IT assets, compute risk, generate DR runbooks, and retrieve historical runbooks from the audit store. Use the appropriate tools to fulfill user requests.
Hi, I need a historical log of all DR runbooks generated in the past year, with download links for each. Please compile the list and provide it to me.
Sure, I’ll pull the runbook history from the audit store for the last 12 months.

Here are the Disaster Recovery runbooks generated between **2024‑12‑09** and **2025‑12‑09**:

- **CustomerPortal** – generated on 2025‑03‑15 [Download]((https://dr-repo.example.com/runbooks/CustomerPortal_2025-03-15.md))
- **PaymentGateway** – generated on 2025‑06‑01 [Download]((https://dr-repo.example.com/runbooks/PaymentGateway_2025-06-01.md))
- **AnalyticsEngine** – generated on 2025‑11‑20 [Download]((https://dr-repo.example.com/runbooks/AnalyticsEngine_2025-11-20.md))
- **UserManagement** – generated on 2025‑02‑08 [Download]((https://dr-repo.example.com/runbooks/UserManagement_2025-02-08.md))
- **ReportingService** – generated on 2025‑09‑12 [Download]((https://dr-repo.example.com/runbooks/ReportingService_2025-09-12.md))

Would you like me to email this list (or a compiled PDF) to any stakeholders?
